sentences: Parimene aasta oodata kui kaks kahetseda.
context: 'Aastad' is the plural form of 'aasta', which means 'year'. In Estonian, this word refers to multiple years or a period of time consisting of several years. It can be used to describe decades (like 60-ndad aastad - the sixties), periods in someone's life, or general concepts about passing years.
